org.apache.paimon.fileindex.bitmap

Class BitmapFileIndexMeta

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.paimon.fileindex.bitmap.BitmapFileIndexMeta
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    BitmapFileIndexMetaV2

    public class BitmapFileIndexMeta
extends Object
     Bitmap file index format (V1)
 +-------------------------------------------------+-----------------
 | version (1 byte)                                |
 +-------------------------------------------------+
 | row count (4 bytes int)                         |
 +-------------------------------------------------+
 | non-null value bitmap number (4 bytes int)      |
 +-------------------------------------------------+
 | has null value (1 byte)                         |
 +-------------------------------------------------+
 | null value offset (4 bytes if has null value)   |       HEAD
 +-------------------------------------------------+
 | value 1 | offset 1                              |
 +-------------------------------------------------+
 | value 2 | offset 2                              |
 +-------------------------------------------------+
 | value 3 | offset 3                              |
 +-------------------------------------------------+
 | ...                                             |
 +-------------------------------------------------+-----------------
 | serialized bitmap 1                             |
 +-------------------------------------------------+
 | serialized bitmap 2                             |
 +-------------------------------------------------+       BODY
 | serialized bitmap 3                             |
 +-------------------------------------------------+
 | ...                                             |
 +-------------------------------------------------+-----------------

 value x:                       var bytes for any data type (as bitmap identifier)
 offset:                        4 bytes int (when it is negative, it represents that there is only one value
                                  and its position is the inverse of the negative value)

      • findEntry

        public BitmapFileIndexMeta.Entry findEntry(Object bitmapId)
        Find entry for bitmap.
        Parameters:
        bitmapId - the bitmap identifier to be searched.
        Returns:
        an BitmapFileIndexMeta.Entry which contains offset and length of bitmap if it is contained in the index meta; otherwise `null`.
